alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 4:26PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Queens, southern Nassau, western Suffolk, and Kings Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 425 PM, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mineola to Kennedy Airport. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Westbury around 430 PM. Garden City and Hicksville around 435 PM. Freeport, Plainview, Mineola, Hempstead and Baldwin around 440 PM EDT. Melville and Wantagh around 445 PM. Levittown, Massapequa and Dix Hills around 450 PM. Farmingdale and Amityville around 455 PM. Commack and Lindenhurst around 500 PM. Deer Park, Babylon and Smithtown around 505 PM. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 8 PM.

area.areaDesc: Kings (Brooklyn); Northwest Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens; Southwest Suffolk
